name: Addison Tote Bag - Black
description: Swap out your usual canvas tote for the Addison bag -- featuring a hanging chain strap intertwined with knotted rope, it will bring an elevated, nautical-inspired touch to your warm-weather outfits. It opens up to reveal a roomy interior that can fit everything you need for the day and more, complete with a magnetic closure to keep your essentials secure yet easily accessible.

name: Addison Tote Bag - Taupe
description: This Addison canvas tote bag is big on functionality. With a roomy main compartment along with multiple front and side pockets, this bag ample room for all your essentials and more -- both inside and outside your bag. It also comes with a detachable chain-knot strap for added style points.
